column2: maybe a minute before|It was right at eight o'clock
column3: maybe a minute before. I went into the demo room to see if I'd left my tin of polish there. And there was this bottle of milk on the trolley and I drank some of it. Just a bit off the top.

column1: 1959|just before eight o' clock|Kuniang made her appearance in my study just before eight o' clock
column2: arrayed in what had once been a "party frock."
quickly. A minute to eight. My hot water bottle was ready
column3: and I filled a glass with water from the tap. Time was of the essence.
